<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Armored Rest](/Feats.aspx?ID=2255) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 52</row>

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
[Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139); trained in light, medium, or heavy armor

</column>

---

You've slept many nights in your armor and gotten used to it. You can sleep in armor overnight without being [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) the next day. If you were already fatigued before sleeping, the armor doesn't prevent you from recovering from being fatigued.
name: Armored Rest
prerequisite: Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
